description:
Apple has been hit with a €150 million fine by France’s competition regulator, the Autorité de la concurrence, for its App Tracking Transparency (ATT) system implementation. While a smaller fine than expected, the regulator’s decision follows an in-depth investigation into the merits of the case, even after the authority had previously rejected a request for... Read more »

The post Apple fined by French regulator over App Tracking Transparency appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Apple fined by French regulator over App Tracking Transparency
